mapper.select: SELECT WIP.LOT_ID, WIP.CARR_ID, MAT.PROD_MTRL_ID, POS.HOLD_YN, MAT.SLOT_NO , MAT.PREV_SLOT_NO , MAT.PREV_CARR_ID FROM WN_WIP_STAT WIP, TN_POS_LOT POS, TN_POS_PRODUCED_MATERIAL MAT WHERE 1 = 1 AND WIP.LOT_ID = POS.LOT_ID AND WIP.LOT_ID = MAT.LOT_ID AND WIP.SITE_ID = #{siteId} AND MAT.USE_STAT_CD = #{useStatCd} AND MAT.USE_STAT_CD = POS.USE_STAT_CD AND WIP.LOT_ID = #{lotId} AND WIP.CARR_ID = #{carrId}
